name: Banana Pirate
description:
The Android smash-hit game Banana Pirate is now available on iOS!

Banana Pirate is a casual arcade game. It's unique top down runner game with only one objective, objective of collecting bananas. Although controls are very simple, mastering the game is exactly the opposite. What is more, you can share results via Game Center leaderboards and compete with your friends.

When you collect certain amount of bananas, you can also unlock achievements and earn bronze, silver and gold medal, however getting them is not an easy task.

Become a master Banana Pirate!
